item.description:
Great Italian Food and Great Conversation with nice people. Break bread...and it is the best bread!!! yum.
Thanks to Helen, another fun afternoon. Bring your ideas for other "cheap eats socials" it is a fun and easy event to host...give it a try.
We limit numbers at these events so it is easier to talk and meet others. Please rsvp yes if you are sure you will make it or change your reply to no as soon as you know so those waiting can join in...there has always been a waiting list so check back often for cancellations if you didn't get on the list. ;-)
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the Reservation Desk at 1 PM...Hosted by Helen.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Cheap Eats Social
